TASK: Add bullet points
DOMAIN: office

STEPS:
1. Open LibreOffice Writer application
   REASONING: Need to launch a word processing application to add bullet points to a document
   ACTION: CLICK(x=0.02, y=0.98)

2. Wait for Start menu to appear
   REASONING: Allow the system to display the Start menu before proceeding
   ACTION: WAIT(1.0)

3. Type to search for LibreOffice Writer
   REASONING: Quickly locate the word processing application through search
   ACTION: TYPE("libreoffice writer")

4. Wait for search results to populate
   REASONING: Give the system time to display matching applications
   ACTION: WAIT(1.0)

5. Click on LibreOffice Writer in search results
   REASONING: Launch the application to begin working with the document
   ACTION: CLICK(x=0.15, y=0.20)

6. Wait for LibreOffice Writer to fully load
   REASONING: Ensure the application window is completely ready before interaction
   ACTION: WAIT(2.0)

7. Type sample text content for bullet points
   REASONING: Create text items that will be converted to bullet points
   ACTION: TYPE("First item\nSecond item\nThird item\nFourth item")

8. Select all the typed text
   REASONING: Need to select the text to apply bullet point formatting to all items
   ACTION: HOTKEY("ctrl", "a")

9. Click on the bullet points button in the toolbar
   REASONING: Apply bullet point formatting to the selected text
   ACTION: CLICK(x=0.15, y=0.13)

10. Click elsewhere in the document to deselect
    REASONING: Deselect the text to view the final result of the bullet points
    ACTION: CLICK(x=0.5, y=0.6)

11. Task completion
    REASONING: Bullet points have been successfully added to the document content
    ACTION: DONE()

EXPECTED_OUTCOME: A LibreOffice Writer document is open with four bullet points displayed, each containing one of the typed items (First item, Second item, Third item, Fourth item). The text is formatted with standard bullet point markers, creating a clear list structure in the document.
